oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson - Live At The Riverside Rancho - 1949-05-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson and the Lone Star Playboys, including Cotton Collins (fiddle, vocals), Hamlet Booker (vocals), Charlie Adams (vocals, bass), Lefty Nason (steel guitar) live performance at the Riverside Rancho, Los Angeles, California for NBC, 1949-05-28, part 1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Lone Star Playboys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Announcer opening statement -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- Yesterday's Mail -- Hank Thompson talks -- Stay A Little Longer (Cotton Collins fiddle) -- Hank Thompson introduces Hamlet Booker -- I'm Biting My Fingernails And Thinking Of You (Hamlet Booker vocals) -- Hank Thompson talks -- My Front Door Is Open -- Announcer talks [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; Thompson, Hank; Lone Star Playboys (Musical group); Nason, Lefty; Collins, O. B. (Oscar B.), 1918-1989; Booker, Hamlet C., 1917-1993; Adams, Charlie (Singer)
